description.de: Trigger aktiv, Signal-Dreieck und Vibration-Sensor erfassen Daten. Signale gehen an DSP Edge. Detect-Schritt hervorgehoben.
description.en: Trigger active, signal triangle and vibration sensor capture data. Signals go to DSP Edge. Detect step highlighted.

description.de: DSP Edge wertet Schwellwerte und Regeln aus und erkennt Anomalien.
description.en: DSP Edge evaluates thresholds and rules to detect anomalies.

description.en: On anomaly, an alarm event is emitted. Alarm box and Alarm step – connection as dotted line.

description.de: Reaktion: Produktion pausieren. Act-Schritt, Alarm-Box und Connection zu Systems & Devices.
description.en: Response: Production pause. Act step, Alarm box and connection to Systems & Devices.
Alarm event is forwarded to target systems (MES/ERP/Analytics).

description.de: Rückmeldung an Zielsysteme für Wartungsplanung. Target-Box, Connection zu Feedback und Feedback-Schritt.
description.en: Feedback to target systems for maintenance scheduling. Target box, connection to Feedback and Feedback step.
